name: The White Knight
description:
The world is run by a corrupt and zealous, theocratic church. To sin is to declare oneself an outlaw and thus thrust his soul from any salvation. Lucky for the god-fearing citizens of this world, the church rules with an iron fist. You are that fist, a paladin by name, hitman by trade. You have just received your next target and have tracked him down to a small town somewhere far from the sight of any heretical saviors to get in your way. Now the only thing standing between you and your partner bringing justice...

Is you.
